title: KOI NAMI ICON FOR OTHER REGIONS TOO PLS

Yo, Heartvine, fill me in on what exactly a 'server skin' is and which regions got what.

A server skin is a skin that is supposed to represent the region. If I'm nor mistaken, the skins were given to all players on the respective server when the skin was released, with the single exception of OCE.

I don't know of many server skins, but the ones I do know are Bear Cavalry Sejuani (Russia, If I'm not mistaken), Uncle Ryze (NA obviously, though it might have also been a 4th of July thing) and Cosmic Reaver Kassadin (OCE).
Uhm? Correct me if I'm wrong, but didnt oceania get pool party ziggs free when the server was launched. It was either oce or lan, pretty sure it was oce

Beta Testers for OCE got Pool Party Ziggs (this happened way before the server skin was even in creation), *however* PP Ziggs isn't a server skin. It's just an excuse Riot used to make OCE pay for their skin unlike every other server, even though there are other servers who've received *multiple* **server** skins for free.

Realistically, only about half of the people (if that) who should've got a free skin did, and it wasn't even a server skin. It was a "sorry we f*cked up and don't have a server skin to give you" skin.

Not to mention, Riot only ever said that PP Ziggs was the "replacement" free skin *when* they announced CR Kassadin, not in the 2-2.5 years before that when they should have.

Point being, Riot screwed over OCE big time and got away with it because most people get blinded the moment they see "charity".
